components.description: A person riding a bicycle for leisure, sport or transport. Intended to be gender-neutral.
components.title: Bicyclist

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a diagonal arrow pointing out the top-right, used as a representation for men.
components.title: Male Sign

title: Man Biking

emoji_net_data.definition: The male version of the ??¬†Bicyclist emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji. The Man Biking emoji is a sequ http://emojipedia.org/man-biking/
emoji_net_data.name: man biking

bn:00083471v: To ride a bicycle or other cycle.

bn:00010248n: A vehicle that has two wheels, one behind the other, a steering handle, and a saddle seat or seats and is usually propelled by the action of a rider's feet upon pedals.
A pedal-powered vehicle, such as a unicycle, bicycle, or tricycle; or, motorized vehicle that has either two or three wheels, such as a motorbike, motorcycle, motorized tricycle, or motortrike.
A bicycle, often called a bike or cycle, is a human-powered, pedal-driven, single-track vehicle, having two wheels attached to a frame, one behind the other.
A vehicle with two wheels in tandem, pedals connected to the rear wheel by a chain, handlebars for steering, and a saddlelike seat.
A wheeled vehicle that has two wheels and is moved by foot pedals

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00024734n: Cycling, also called bicycling or biking, is the use of bicycles for transport, recreation, or for sport.
The sport of riding and racing bicycles.
The use of bicycles for transport, recreation, or sport.
The sport of riding a bicycle.
The sport of riding and racing cycles, especially bicycles.
The sport of traveling on a bicycle or motorcycle

bn:00010258n: A person who rides a bicycle
A person who rides a cycle, especially a bicycle, or who habitually engages in cycling.
One who rides a bicycle, particularly one who does so regularly, or as an enthusiast.

apple_vendor_description: The man biking emoji on Apple devices portrays a dynamic figure in motion, with a sleek bicycle rendered in Apple's signature 3D style. Realistic lighting casts subtle shadows, emphasizing the smooth, rounded edges of both the cyclist's form and the bike frame, conveying a sense of energetic movement and outdoor activity. This emoji is perfect for communicating about exercise, travel, or enjoying the fresh air in your Apple communications.
